metadata.title: CVE-2022-20011 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In getArray of NotificationManagerService.java , there is a possible leakof one user notifications to another due to missing check. This could leadto local information disclosure with no additional execution privilegesneeded. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product:AndroidVersions: Android-10 Android-11 Android-12 Android-12LAndroid ID:A-214999128

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
